ƆWƐN-ABAN—NEA ADESUA NSƐM WOM December 2017 Adesua nsɛm a yebesua January 29 kosi February 25, 2018. ‘Minim sɛ Ɔbɛsɔre’ Adɛn nti na yebetumi agye adi paa sɛ daakye awufo bɛsɔre? “Mewɔ Anidaso Wɔ Onyankopɔn Mu” Adɛn nti na owusɔre yɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a Kristofo gyidi gyina so paa? So Wokae? Woakenkan Ɔwɛn-Aban a aba nnansa yi? Ɛnde, nsɛmmisa a egyina Bible so no, hwɛ emu dodow a wubetumi abua. Nsɛmmisa a Efi Akenkanfo Hɔ Tete Israel no, obiara a na Mesia no bɛfa no so aba no, na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ abakan anaa
..........
 wɔn babarima anaa wɔn babea pɛ sɛ ohyira ne ho so na ɔbɔ asu a, etumi gyaw wɔn adwinnwen? Wɔbɛyɛ dɛn aboa wɔn ba no ama wanyin akɔ nkwagye mu? Mmabun—‘Monkɔ So Nyɛ Mo Ankasa Nkwagye Ho Adwuma’ Asubɔ yɛ aniberesɛm, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mmabun suro anaa wopia to nkyɛn. ASETENAM NSƐM Migyaw Biribiara Hɔ Kodii Owura no Akyi Bere a Felix Fajardo yɛɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔbɛyɛ Kristo suani no, na wadi mfe 16 pɛ. Bɛboro mfe 70 ni, onnuu ne ho sɛ wadi Owura no akyi akɔ baabiara a Owura no aka sɛ nkɔ. Nsɛm a Wɔahyehyɛ—

1Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákpɛ béde Yerusalem na bétédu Betfage na Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ na batɔ anumi. 2Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biteesie lɛkpaklɔ lɛni ntɛ-mii lɛtɔtɔ mmɔ kemo. Mmɔ ni, bɛdubɔnu ebuo utine ɔni na bákya-nwu kabuli na ubidi unye-nwu kudɔ. Bidie-nwu kabuli na biti-ma biboku-mi. 3Na si ukyuli ɔdi úye-mii lɛla lɛdi ni, bɛsu-nwu bɛnii, 'Blɔti mɔɔwia-ma.' Na badubɔnyonu-ma bete-mii kɔnakunwi." 4Ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ lɛni aani kalɛ na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi ɔ
..........
Na si bídie kenye kaduɛ ni, asa masu-mii kenyekɔ kani na mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni. 25Wɛ na Yohane ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kani na ubo asa na ɔ́kpila bekyuli ntu ɔ́siku? Katɔti kudɔ na kási munuu ukyuli kudɔ na kási?" Amu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ teenu banii, "Bi na ɔlɛka bɔsu? Si bɔ́su bɔnii kási Katɔti kudɔ ni, ɔdubuye-bu ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na bítafɔ Yohane bítadi?' 26Nsu si bɔ́su bɔnii ukyuli kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ-ka ɔ́siku ni, bɔɔyia ka bekyuli badubɔbla-bu lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika bana fui báfɔ bádi banii Katɔti kenye udi

Yohane Adiyisɛm 19Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI) Nnipakuw a wɔwɔ soro ani gye 19 Eyi akyi metee nne bi te sɛ nnipakuw a wɔwɔ soro se, “Haleluia! Nkwagye ne anuonyam ne tumi wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn 2 efisɛ, n’atemmu yɛ nokware na ɛteɛ sɛ obuu oguamanfo kɛse a ɔde n’aguamammɔ asɛe asase no atɛn. Onyankopɔn atwe n’aso efisɛ, okum n’asomfo.” 3 Na afei wɔteɛɛm bio se, “Haleluia! Wusiw a efi ne nkyɛn no kɔ soro daa daa.” 4 Mpanyimfo aduonu anan ne ateasefo baanan no butubutuw Onyankopɔn a ɔte n’ahengua so no anim som no
..........
nkɔ fitaa wɔ hɔ. Na nea ɔte ne so no din de “Ɔseadeɛyɔ ne Ɔnokwafo.” Nokware na ogyina so bu atɛn ko ne ko. 12 N’aniwa te sɛ ogya a ɛredɛw a na ɔhyɛ ahenkyɛw bebree. Na ɔwɔ din bi a wɔakyerɛw agu ne ho, nanso na obiara nnim nea ɛyɛ ka ne ho. 13 Na wɔde n’atade a ɛhyɛ no no anu mogya mu. Din a wɔde frɛ no ne “Onyankopɔn Asɛm.” 14 Ɔsoro asraafo a wɔhyehyɛ nwera fitaa a ani tew a wɔtete apɔnkɔ fitafitaa so dii n’akyi. 15 Nkrante a ano yɛ nnam yiye a ɔde bedi aman so fii n’anom bae. TI DUNKRON Fa Wo Ho Sie Onyankopɔn Dɔ Mu Dɛn na Onyankopɔn a yɛbɛdɔ no no kyerɛ? Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn atumi de yɛn ho asie Onyankopɔn dɔ mu? Dɛn na Yehowa de betua wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho sie ne dɔ mu no ka? FA NO sɛ worekɔ baabi da bi a ahum retu. Ewim ayɛ tumm. Anyinam afi ase repaapae, aprannaa rebobom, na afei osu no fi ase tɔ denneennen. Woyɛ ntɛm tu mmirika de anibere hwehwɛ baabi a wubehintaw. Wuhu sɛ ɔdan bi si ɔkwan no nkyɛn hɔ. Ɔdan no yɛ nea edi mũ, nsu no nkɔ mu, na emu yɛ ahomeka. Hwɛ sɛnea w’ani b
..........
Yiw, Bible adesua a yɛn ankasa yɛyɛ ne mpae a yefi komam bɔ yɛ yɛn som fã a ɛho hia, na ɛboa yɛn ma yɛde yɛn ho sie Onyankopɔn dɔ mu. MA W’ANI NNYE WƆ WO SOM MU 15 Bible adesua a yɛn ankasa yɛ ne mpaebɔ yɛ yɛn som no fã a yɛyɛ wɔ kokoam. Nanso, afei ma yensusuw yɛn som no fã bi a yɛyɛ wɔ baguam no ho: yɛn gyidi ho asɛm a yɛka kyerɛ afoforo. So woaka Bible mu nokwasɛm akyerɛ afoforo dedaw? Sɛ ɛte saa a, ɛnde woanya hokwan a ɛyɛ anigye paa. (Luka 1:74) Sɛ yɛka Yehowa Nyankopɔn ho nokwasɛm a yɛasua

NKYƐM A ƐTO SO ANUM NNWOM 107-150 Onyankopɔn adɔe 1“Monna Awurade ase efisɛ oye; n’adɔe wɔ hɔ daa!” 2 Ti saa asɛm yi mu fa kamfo Awurade, mo a wagye mo. Wagye mo afi mo atamfo nsam. 3 Ɔde mo afi amanɔnne. Ɔde mo afi apuei ne atɔe, atifi ne anafo. 4 Ebinom nantew sare a ɔkwan nna mu so a wontumi nhu kwan mma kurom mmɛtena mu. 5 Ɔkɔm ne sukɔm dee wɔn maa wɔn anidaso sae. 6 Na wɔn haw mu, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn haw mu. 7 Ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwan tee so baa kurom faako a wobetumi atena. 8 Ɛsɛ

ɛn mu wɔ po so a na po so adwumayɛ na wofi mu didi. 24 Wohui sɛ Awurade tumi yɛ anwonwade wɔ po so nso. 25 Ɔkasae mmaa ahum fii ase tui na ɛwosowoo asorɔkye no. 26 Ahyɛn no pagyaw kɔɔ soro na ɛsan bɔ wuraa po no mu, kɔɔ ase pɛɛ. Saa amanehunu yi maa nnipa bo tui 27 ma wokyim tɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabofo. Wɔn suahu nyinaa ho amma mfaso. 28 Afei wɔn haw mu no, wɔfrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn haw no mu. 29 Ɔbrɛɛ ahum no ase na asorɔkye no yɛɛ dinn. 30 Ɛyɛɛ dinn no, wɔn ani gyei na ɔde wɔn baa hyɛngyi

1Na akwa leevu-ene kama ni, lɛ́sɔ línwini lísie Yerusalem ku Barnaba. Na líti Tito lɛ́da. 2Lísie mmɔ ɔsika Katɔti nédie ɔ́tina-mi. Na lídie ala kalɔ lɛ́tina-ma ɔkɛnku litemi buni lɛni lɛ́sa na lɛ́kɔ líte bani naaadi Yudafuɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ami ku batɔnkune bani ntɔnku bafɔtaadine akpa ammɔ lɛti nása. Ɔsika naaayɔ nnii ɔkɛnku batɔnkune bammɔ ɔsu na mina kabla kani mɔɔbla mɛni iye kani na lɛ́bla lɛ́vi kabla keeke. 3Tito ɔni na líti nda ni, ina ka ɔdi Grikini ni, ukyuli ɔdi útenye-nwu lɛlɔ ka ukulo l

YudaNkwa Asem (NA-TWI) 1 Yesu Kristo somfo Yuda a ɔyɛ Yakobo ne nua na ɔkyerɛw krataa yi. De kɔmaa wɔn a Onyankopɔn afrɛ wɔn na wɔte Agya Onyankopɔn dɔ ne Yesu Kristo banbɔ mu. 2 Mmɔborɔhunu ne ɔdɔ a ɛdɔɔso nka mo. Atoro adiyifo 3 Me nnamfonom, na merebɔ mmɔden akyerɛw mo afa nkwagye a yɛn nyinaa te mu no ho. Nanso ɛsɛ sɛ mekyerɛw mo wɔ asɛm foforo ho na moyere mo ho gyina nokware a Onyankopɔn de ama ne nkurɔfo afebɔɔ a ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsesa mu nna nyinaa no akyi pintinn. 4 Nnipa bi awiawia wɔn ho abɛf
..........
 Wɔayɛ dɔm sɛnea Kora yɛɛ dɔm no nam so ma wɔasɛe wɔn sɛ ɔno. 12 Wɔte sɛ nkekae fi a ɛwɔ wo nua aduan a ɔne wo di mu a wɔmfɛre ho. Wɔn ani ku wɔn ara wɔn ho. Na wɔte sɛ omununkum a esi na mframa bɔ no nanso osu ntɔ. Wɔte sɛ nnua a ɛnsow aba asusow mu. Wɔte sɛ nnua a wɔatutu ne ntini ama awu koraa. 13 Wɔte sɛ ɛpo asorɔkye a ano yɛ den a, wɔn aniwude a wɔyɛ no huru sɛ ahuru. Paulo ne atoro asomafo 1Mewɔ anidaso sɛ, sɛ meyɛ nkwaseade koraa a, mubegye me. Mepa mo kyɛw, monyɛ saa. 2 Metwe mo ho ninkunu sɛnea Onyankopɔn twe mo ho ninkunu no. Mote sɛ ɔbaabun a, mahyɛ ɔbarima baako pɛ bi a, ɔno ne Kristo no bɔ sɛ mede mo bɛma no aware. 3 Misuro sɛ wɔbɛsɛe mo adwene na mo a mode mo ho nyinaa ama Kristo no, mubegyae sɛnea Ɔwɔ no nam anifere so daadaa Hawa no. 4 Mode anigye gye obiara a ɔba mo nkyɛn bɛka Yesu foforo a ɔnyɛ nea yɛka ne ho asɛm kyerɛ mo no di; mugye honhom no

Meka ahohoahoa ho asɛm a, na mekasa sɛ ɔkwasea. 18 Nanso esiane sɛ nnipa bebree hoahoa wɔn ho nipasu mu nti, me nso mɛyɛ saa. 19 Mo ankasa mo ani atew nti mode anigye gye nkwaseafo. 20 Mugye obi a ɔhyɛ mo so anaa nea onya mo ho biribi anaa nea osum mo firi anaa nea ommu mo anaa nea ɔbɔ mo ani so. 21 Mefɛre sɛ megye eyi ato mu, nanso yɛn ahoɔmmerɛw na ɛma yɛyɛɛ saa. Twi Twi ye Kasa wכ Ghana man mu. Nipa beye pepepem nson na eka Twi Kasa wכ Ghana. Ghanafoכ wכ kasa ahoroכ beberee. Twi ka Akan Kasa abusua a yefre no Kwa Kasa Abusua no ho. Twi gu mu ahoroכ pii nanso ne nyinaa ye kasa baako a obiara te ase. Yewכ Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Akyem Twi ene nea ekeka ho. Twi a, yeka daadaa no nteasee nye na. Ɛno akyiri no, yewכ mme ne akasakoa a, ewכ se obi de n'adwene kכ akyiri ansa na wate asee. Wope se woka obi anim asem wכ abere a, wompe se wofom no a, wobu no be. Nti na mpaninfoכ bu be bi se: "כba nyansafoכ, yebu no be, na yennka no asem". Kasakoa ye asem a, ne nkyereasee enna tee. Ne saa nti no obi a, n'ani mfiriie no rente asee. Yemfa no se, obi awu, na ne ba ketewa wכ hכ na wompe se כbe te se n'awofoכ awu a, woka no se: "asemasi adane n'ani ahwe dan", anaa se, "asemasi aka nkyene agu". Ɛtoaso bio, yeka kasakoa de anidie ma obi a, odi nim. Ɛno nti, se כhene wu a, yeka se: "Nana kכ ne kra akyi".

“Bɛhakye Kɛ Me Nee Bɛ Lua Dahuu” “Bɛhakye kɛ me nee bɛ lua dahuu, kɔkpula ewiade awieleɛ.” 1. (a) Ka abɛlɛ ne nee ndile ne anwo edwɛkɛ ne sikalɛ. (b) Kɛzi Gyisɛse hilehilele nu ɛ? GYISƐSE BELEMGBUNLILILƐ ne anwo mrɛlɛ ne mɔ ko fane ɛyazonlɛnli bie mɔɔ ɔluale abɛlɛ wɔ ye ɛya nu na kpɔvolɛ bie luale ndile wɔ nu la anwo. Ndile ne vole abɛlɛ ne azo, noko ɛyazonlɛnli ne zele ye sonvolɛma ne kɛ “bɛgyakyi bɛ bɛmaa bɛbɔ nu bɛnyi ɔhɔdwu ɛbuhenle ne.” Ɛbuhenle ne dwu a, bɛbazɛkye ndile ne na bɛaboɔboa abɛ
..........
e ati yɛbayɛ. Ɛlɛ nwolɛ adenle kɛ ɛbayɛ bie.” Duzu a bɛyɛle ye wɔ nwo a? The Watch Tower mɔɔ rale 1922 ne anu la, bɔle amaneɛ kɛ, ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane Baebolo sukoavoma ne mianle bɛ edwɛkɛhanlɛ gyima ne anu. Yeangyɛ biala, azua nu daselɛlilɛ ne rayɛle zɔhane nɔhalɛ Keleseɛnema ne sɛkɛlɛneɛ kɛmɔ ɔde ye ɛnɛ la. 12. Mekɛ boni a bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛboɔboa abɛlɛ eku ne anloa a? 12 Mɔɔ ɔtɔ zo nwiɔ, abɛlɛ ne ɛbulɛ. Gyisɛse zele anwumabɔvolɛ ne mɔ kɛ: “Bɛbu abɛlɛ ne bɛgua me bonwolo ne azo.” (Mat. 13:30) Ɔvi 19

Adɛn Nti na Monkɔ Ɔko? Nneɛma a yɛabobɔ din wɔ ase ha yi nti na Yehowa Adansefo nkɔ ɔko: Yetie Onyankopɔn. Bible ka sɛ Onyankopɔn asomfo de “wɔn nkrante bɛyɛ nsɔw” na “wɔrensua akodi bio.” —Yesaia 2:4. Yetie Yesu. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔsomafo Petro sɛ: “San fa wo nkrante no hyɛ nea ɛhyɛ, na wɔn a wɔtwe nkrante nyinaa bewu nkrante ano.” (Mateo 26: 52) Yesu asɛm no kyerɛ sɛ n’akyidifo remfa akode nkɔ ko. Asɛm a Yesu kae sɛ n’asuafo nyɛ “wiase no fã” no, yetie, enti yɛmfa yɛn ho nhyehyɛ amanyɔsɛm mu. ( Y
..........
-12. Nea tete Kristofo no yɛe. Nhoma bi a wɔato din Encyclopedia of Religion and War ka sɛ: “Yesu akyidifo a wodi kan no ankɔ ko, na wɔamfa wɔn ho anhyɛ sraadi mu,” na mmom wobuu no sɛ “ɛne Yesu dɔ ne n’ahyɛde a ɛse a yɛnnɔ yɛn atamfo no nhyia.” Germanni nyamekyerɛfo Peter Meinhold nso kaa Yesu asuafo a wodi kan no ho asɛm sɛ: “Wɔtee nka sɛ obi rentumi nyɛ Kristoni na ɔnsan nyɛ sraani.” Nea yɛyɛ de boa ɔman nkɔso Yehowa Adansefo yɛ ɔmamma pa; yentutu ɔman ase, enti yɛn ho nyɛ hu. “Ԑha na ԑyԑ daa nkwa-sԑ wobehu Onyankopɔn ne nokware Nyankopɔn nkutoo no, ne nea ԑsԑ sԑ mosua sԑnea mo ankasa mobԑyԑ Nyankopɔn…sԑnea Nyankopɔn nyinaa yԑe ara, ansa na mo nso mobԑyԑ…?-Odiyisԑm Yosef Smith Nkyerԑkyerԑ, ԑnam Yosef Fielding Smith 1976, p. 346 Sԑ woyԑ “Onyankopɔn” a ɔkwan bԑn so na wobԑyi wo mma mu biako sԑ owu ntua ewiase a ԑyԑ wode bɔne? “Asase biara wɔ no gyefo, na asase biara wɔ no sɔhwԑfo na asase biara mufo afa ahoyeraw no nyinaa a yԑrefa mu”-Brigham Young, Journal of Discourses po 14, kr. 71-72 Ɔyerenom dodow ahe na ԑbԑma woanya honhom mma a ԑbԑhyԑ asase so mᾱ sԑnea ԑsԑ? – Afe 1998 wɔ U.S Asoԑe a obu ɔmanfo dodow ho Akontaa (Census Bureau) Bɔɔ amanneԑ sԑ asase so nnipa dodow yԑ ɔpepepem nnum nne nkrɔn (5.9 billion) - Dabiara da Abawo Akontaabu yԑ Apem ahanu ne dunson (217000) - Apemfo mmɔho 217000 x 279 nnafua yԑ 60543000 ɔyerenom - Nsrahwԑ ma ɔyerenom yԑ Apem nso ne biako (7001) anibu biara. “…M’anim wɔnnwenee Nyankopɔn bi na M’akyi nso ebi remma”-Yesaia 43:10

1Ɔmɛni ndi litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ɔni ndi Katɔti ɔlati ubidi. 2Kukuuku ni, Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni úse ka Katɔti ɔ́su Ubidi ɔnini, “Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na wagyu watɔ-ɔ, kalɛ na ɔklibi bekyuli ute fula bubo. 3Adubunu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔkɛ ɔɔva na ketele kemo taasu ɔnini, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo!' ” 4Ɔtu ɔmɛni ndi Yohane. Anwu nébo úbelie ketele kemo, kesii kani na ɔɔkpila bekyuli ntu na ketu kemo aani kalɛ na Yudafuɔ baabla kalɛ
..........
use aani ama bani baatina ɔda bubo. Mmomu ni, ɔɔtina ala ku ɔyikun taasiku nwuna kayi kemo. 23Uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kulie-nwu lɛlɔ ɔkya kasalakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́va momoomo ɔnini, 24“Yesu Nasareni, bi na aawia asiku bula kudɔ? Bubo na ébo anii abakyula-bu? Ngyi ukyuli ɔni na adi. Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ɔtalane Kedee!” 25Yesu ɔ́bala kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Da bɔtɛmi ya! Hena na Ɔde Mo Som no Bae? Yehowa Adansefo a wɔwɔ hɔ nnɛ no, wɔn som no fii ase bɛboro mfe 130 ni. Mfiase no, Bible asuafo kakraa bi a na wɔte Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania wɔ United States tɔɔ wɔn bo yɛɛ Bible mu nhwehwɛmu kɔɔ akyiri. Wɔde nneɛma a na asɔre ahorow kyerɛkyerɛ no totoo nea Bible kyerɛkyerɛ ankasa ho. Afei nea wosuae no, wofii ase de bi kɔɔ nhoma ne atesɛm nkrataa mu, na wɔde bi nso yɛɛ nhoma a wɔato din Ɔwɛn-Aban Bible asuafo anokwafo yi mu biako ne ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Charles Taze Russell. Bible adesua a na wɔreyɛ no, Russell na na odi wɔn anim; ɔno ara nso na odii anim ma wɔyɛɛ Ɔwɛn-Aban no, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ na wakɔfa ɔsom foforo aba. Saa bere no, na wɔfrɛ wɔn Bible Asuafo; nea na esi Russell ne wɔn a aka no ani so ne sɛ wɔbɛboa nkurɔfo ama wɔahu Yesu Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ. Afei nso na wɔpɛ sɛ wodi Kristofo a wɔtenaa ase asomafo no bere so no anammɔn akyi. Yesu Kristo na ɔde Kristosom bae, enti yebu no sɛ ɔno na ɔde yɛn som no bae.

Bible na Yɛde Bɔ Yɛn Bra Nyansahufo Bi Kyerɛkyerɛ Ne Gyidi Mu Ɔbenfo Hans Kristian Kotlar suaa nipadua mu tumi a ɛko tia nyarewa ho ade, na ɛma obisaa nea ɛyɛe a nkwa bae. Ɔkwan bɛn so na Bible a osuae ma onyaa ne nsɛmmisa ho mmuae? Na Mede Asi M’ani So sɛ Mɛko Atia Ntɛnkyea ne Awudisɛm Antoine Touma huu Kung Fu bɔ paa, nanso asɛm a ɛwɔ 1 Timoteo 4:8 no sesaa n’asetena. Me Tuo De, Mankɔ Annya Hɔ Da Annunziato Lugarà de ne ho kɔbɔɔ akobɔfo kuw bi, nanso Ahenni Asa so a ɔkɔe no sesaa n’asetena. Wɔde Bible Yii Me Nsɛmmisa Nyinaa Ano! Ná Isolina Lamela yɛ Roman sista, na ɔbɛyɛɛ obi a Komunis adwene adi ne ti, nanso emu biara ammoa no. Akyiri yi, ohyiaa Yehowa Adansefo, na wɔde Bible boaa no ma ohuu nea ɔde n’asetena bɛyɛ. “Asase so Paradise Ho Bɔhyɛ No Sesaa M’asetena” Ade a na Ivars Vigulis da dwen ho ara ne sɛ obenya din ne anuonyam ne moto akansi no mu anigye. Bere a osuaa Bible no, nsakrae bɛn na ɔyɛe?

Adesua 64: Salomo Si Asɔredan ANSA na Dawid rewu no, ɔde Yehowa asɔredan a wobesi no nsusuwso a Onyankopɔn de mae no maa Salomo. N’ahenni afe a ɛto so anan no mu no, Salomo fii asɔredan no si ase, na ɔde mfe ason ne fã wiei. Nnipa ɔpedudu pii yɛɛ asɔredan no ho adwuma, na egyee sika pii. Efisɛ wɔde sika kɔkɔɔ ne dwetɛ pii dii dwuma wɔ mu. Ná asɔredan no wɔ afã atitiriw abien, sɛnea na ntamadan no wɔ no. Nanso na afã yi kɛse yɛ ntamadan no mu de no mmɔho. Salomo ma wɔde apam adaka no kosii piam, 
..........
lomo, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: ‘Megye ahenni no afi wo nsam de ama onipa foforo. Merenyɛ eyi wo bere so, na mmom wo ba ahenni mu. Nanso merennye ahemman no mu nnipa nyinaa mfi wo ba nsam.’ Ma yɛnhwɛ sɛnea eyi bae. 1 Beresosɛm 28:9-21; 29:1-9; 1 Ahene 5:1-18; 2 Beresosɛm 6:12-42; 7:1-5; 1 Ahene 11:9-13. Nsɛmmisa - Bere tenten bɛn na Salomo de sii Yehowa asɔredan no wiei, na dɛn nti na egyee sika pii saa? - Asɔredan no wɔ afã atitiriw ahe, na dɛn na wɔde sii piam hɔ? - Bere a wosii asɔredan no wiei no

Kumasi Kumasi: (Kumase) ye Ghana kuro kesee a eso sene Ghana nkuro nyinaa gyese Nkran (Accra). Nnipa a ewo Kumasi beye Opepepem baako (1,000,000) Kumasi abako sem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a Odi Kan bere so. Abakosem kyerese, enam Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a wofre no Komfo Anokye so na emaa Kumasiman yee kese. Wokyere se Komfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yefre no Kumasi yi ene baabi a ene wofre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ekaa Kumasi dua no. Eno na eboa maa 
..........
Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture. Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede University of Education, Kumasi Campus, ene mmiensa bi a ennye aban dea te se KNUST. Ene Christian Service University College (CSUC), Ghana Baptist University ene Garden City University ewo Kumasi nkwantia kuro bi a yefre no Ankaase. Kumasi Polytechni

The Tower of Babel (Genesis 11: 1-9) Akan / Twi / Fante Akuapem Twi orthography - Saa bere no na asase sofo nyinaa ka kasa biako na na wɔwɔ nsɛmfua koro. - Bere a wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛɛ apuei no, wɔkɔtoo asasetaw bi wɔ Sinar asase so, na wɔtenaa hɔ. - Ɛnna wɔkeka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ: “Hwɛ! Momma yɛnyɛ birikisi mfa ogya ntõ.” Enti birikisi bɛyɛɛ abo maa wɔn, na wɔde kootaa hyehyɛe. - Ɛnna wɔsan kae sɛ: “Hwɛ! Momma yɛnkyekye kurow kɛse na yɛnto abantenten a n’atifi bedu soro, na yennye din, na yɛammɔ an
..........
lfgang Kuhl Asante Twi orthography - Saa berɛ no na asase sofoɔ nyinaa ka kasa baako na na wɔwɔ nsɛmfua korɔ. - Berɛ a wɔde wɔn ani kyerɛɛ apueeɛ no, wɔkɔtoo asasetamaa bi wɔ Sinar asase so, na wɔtenaa hɔ. - Ɛnna wɔkeka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ: “Hwɛ! Momma yɛnyɛ birikisi mfa gya ntõ.” Enti birikisi bɛyɛɛ aboɔ maa wɔn, na wɔde kootaa hyehyɛeɛ. - Ɛnna wɔsan kaa sɛ: “Hwɛ! Momma yɛnkyekyere kuro kɛseɛ na yɛnto abantenten a n’atifi bɛduru soro, na yɛnnye din, na yɛammɔ anhwete asase nyinaa so.” - Afei Yehow

J.B. Danquah Joseph Kwame Kyeretwie Boakye Danquah yɛ Ghana panyin baako a wɔampene Kwame Nkrumah aban wɔ bere a Ghana nyaa faahodie ekyi no. Na ne mfɛfo frɛ no Nana Kwame Kyeretwie. Wɔwoo Danquah wɔ Bempong wɔ Akanman mu. Na ɔyɛ ɔdehye a ofi Ofori Panyin fie a saa bere no wɔyɛ ɔman Ghana ameneɛkuw nhyehyɛe nnipa titiriw. Danquah kɔɔ London suapɔn na hɔ na osuaa abakɔsɛm ne felɔsɔfi. Ɔyɛ obibini a odi kan a suapɔn no maa no DOCTRATE a wɔ abakɔsɛm mu. Ɔsan baa Ghana (saa bere no na wɔfrɛ no Gold 
..........
 wɔfa amanyɛsɛm ho wɔ afe 1930 ne ekyi. Eyi de no kɔɔ Britainman mu wɔ 1934. Fi 1934 kosi 1937 no, na ɔyɛ Nsɛnkyerɛwni-Panin wɔ "Gold Coast Youth Conference". Danquah bɛyɛɛ mmrahyɛbedwani wɔ 1946 mu na ɔhwehwɛɛ kwan a wɔbɛhyehyɛ mmra ɛbɛboa ama Ghana enya faahodie. Ɔboaa sɛ wɔbɛtew kuw United Gold Coast Convention. Bere a Kwame Nkrumah fii amanɔne bae no, ɔdanee kuw no yɛɛ amanyɔkuw. Wɔ 1946 mu no, tumi ho mansotwe kakraa tuu UGCC ase na Nkrumah tew ne ho kɔtew Convention People's Party (CPP). W

ankopɔn wɔ abodin ahorow pii. “Onyankopɔn” ne “Awurade” yɛ abodin no bi. Na Bible kyerɛkyerɛ nso sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ din ankasa: Ɛne Yehowa. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ Onyankopɔn din pue mpɛn mpempem pii wɔ tete Bible nsaano nkyerɛwee no mu. Enti, Yehowa pɛ sɛ wuhu ne din na wode di dwuma. Yebetumi aka sɛ ɔnam

BIBLE MU AKORADE | YESAIA 17-23 Obi De Ne Tumi Yɛ Nea Ɔpɛ a, Efi Ne Nsa Ná Sebna yɛ ‘ofie sohwɛfo,’ na ɛbɛyɛ sɛ ɔno na na ɔhwɛ Ɔhene Hesekia fie so. Ghana Ghana anaa Gaana yɛ kuro bi a ɛwɔ Africa atɔeɛ mantam hɔ. Nkuro a atwa ne ho ahyia no bi ne Côte d’Ivoire (ɛno wɔ atɔe fam), Burkina Faso (ɛno wɔ atifi fam), Togo (ɛno wɔ apue fam) ɛna Gulf of Guinea no wɔ anafo fam. Edin Ghana no kyerɛ “Ɔko mu Hene” na wonyaa saa din no fii tete Ghana empire no mu. Kane no, na ahenfo ahodoɔ na woagye Ghana asase no afa paa yie, te sɛ Asanti Ahenni, Akwamufo, Bonomanfo, Denkyirafoɔ, Fantefoɔ, ne afoforo a wɔka ho. Ebinom de, na wɔnyɛ Akanfoɔ, te sɛ Nkranfoɔ ne Dagombafoɔ. Wɔne Aborofo ntam guadi fii ase bere a wɔne Pɔtgɔkyifoɔ yɛ ntease apam wɔ mfe 1500 mu hɔ. Ɛno akyi no, Britainfo maa nea wɔfrɛ no Sika mpoano Ahenni no fii asɛ wɔ afe 1874 mu wɔ Ghana mmeae bi pɛ. Gold Coast nyaa ne fahondie wɔ afe 1957 mu fii wɔn sodifoɔ a na wɔne United Kingdom no. ɛno ma Ghana bɛyɛɛ ɔman a edin nkan nyaa ne fahondie wɔ abibirim mantam ha. Asante Mantaw Asante Mantam wɔ Gaana mu. Asante Mantam wɔ Abibiman so wɔ Asaase so. Asante ne din ahodo bi ne: Esuante. Afe 1695 beremu na Asantehene Nana Ɔsɛe Tutu tintimm no. Bere wɔ ha yɛ 0 nnɔnhwere firi Greenwich bere ho. Ɔda tentenedo 0.15Anee kɔpem 2.25Anee na tɛtɛredo 5.50Etifi kɔpem 7.46Etifi. Atitirifo Otumfoo Ɔsɛe Tutu, ne John Kofi Agyekum Kufuor firi saa bea yi. Adaekɛse na Odwira ka afahyɛ na dwumadi ɛkɔ so wɔ Asanteman mu. Akanfo, Nkramofo na Akristofo ka nkorɔfo a wɔfi borɔn yi do.

WƆBƆE ANAA? Agyinamoa Ano Mfemfem—Sɛnea Ɛyɛ Adwuma NNYINAMOA dodow no ara didi anadwo. Sɛ ade sa a, wɔn ano mfemfem na ɛboa wɔn ma wɔhu baabi a aboa bi wɔ na wɔakyere no. Susu ho: Nnyinamoa ano mfemfem boa ma wɔhu baabi a mframa ani kyerɛ. Enti sɛ biribi wɔ sum mu a, wɔtumi “hu” bere mpo a wɔmfaa wɔn ani ankasa nhui. Sɛ aboa bi nam baabi anaa biribi si kwan mu a, mfemfem yi boa agyinamoa no ma ɔhu dekode no ntɛm. Mfemfem koro yi ara ma agyinamoa hu sɛnea tokuru bi kɛse te ansa na ɔbɛwura mu a wa
..........

ƆFÃ 14 Wobɛyɛ Dɛn Adi Yehowa Nokware? Gyina Onyankopɔn afã. 1 Petro 5:6-9 Mfa wo ho nhyɛ amanne ahorow a Bible kasa tia mu. Egye akokoduru na watumi ayɛ saa. Mfa wo ho nhyɛ amanaman no amammuisɛm mu; wonnyina Yehowa ne n’Ahenni no akyi. Si gyinae pa—tie Onyankopɔn. Mateo 7:24, 25 Wo ne Yehowa Adansefo mmɔ; wɔbɛboa wo ma woabɛn Onyankopɔn. Kɔ so sua Onyankopɔn ho ade na bɔ mmɔden sɛ wubedi n’ahyɛde so. Sɛ wo gyidi mu yɛ den a, ɛsɛ sɛ wuhyira wo nkwa so ma Yehowa na wobɔ asu.—Mateo 28:19. Tie Onyankopɔn. Kenkan Bible, na ma Yehowa Adansefo mmoa wo na te ase. Afei fa nea wusua no di dwuma. Woyɛ saa a, wobɛtena ase daa.—Dwom 37:29.

Facebook yɛ chat program a obiara de yɛ dwuma a wotumi ne obi kasa abraa onipa koro no mpo wo Amɛrika na wowɔ Gaana. Nnipa beye 1,000,000,000 a eko 2,000,000,000 na ewo Facebook yi. Wotumi de foto to so na obi atwerɛ ho deɛ ope. Facebook so amanneɛ nso wo ho paa. Ebi ne se obi ne wobekasa a wonnim no. Na oye obarima na one obaa bekasa a onnim no. Yei nti, no obi frɛɛ nnipa a wowo facebook bebree a ɔnnim wɔn maa wɔbaa Haren,Hɔlan. Wɔbaa hɔ no,Wɔwiaa nnoɔma firii setɔɔ bi a wɔfre no Albert Heijn. Koti antumi ankye yeinom biom. Ammanne no bi nie.Yei sii afe 2012 no mu.

Awurade ayeyi dwom 1Kamfo Awurade! Mifi me koma nyinaa mu bɛda Awurade ase wɔ ne nkurɔfo a wɔabɔ gua no anim. 2 Nneɛma a Awurade yɛ no yɛ nwonwa! Wɔn a wɔn ani gye ho no pɛ sɛ wɔte ase. 3 Tumi ne anuonyam wɔ nea ɔyɛ biara mu na ne trenee wɔ hɔ daa. 4 Awurade remma yɛn werɛ mfi n’anwonwade. Ne yam ye na ohu mmɔbɔ. 5 Wɔn a wodi no ni no, ɔma wɔn aduan. Ne werɛ mfi n’apam. 6 Wakyerɛ ne tumi akyerɛ ne nkurɔfo sɛ ɔde ananafo asase ama wɔn. 7 Biribiara a ɔyɛ no, ɔyɛ no nokwarem. Ne mmara nni huammɔ. 8 Bere biara ɛwɔ hɔ. Wɔhyɛɛ no nokware ne trenee mu. 9 Ɔmaa ne nkurɔfo dee wɔn ho na ɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam a ɛwɔ hɔ daa. Ɔyɛ kronkron ne Otumfoɔ! 10 Worepɛ nyansa a, di Awurade ni. Obu wɔn a wodi ne mmara so nyinaa atɛntrenee. Ɔsɛ ayeyi daa.

Ninyɛne Boni Mɔ A Mebahola Meayɛ Nwolɛ Asɔne A? Baebolo ne bua kɛ Ɛbahola wɔayɛ debie biala mɔɔ nee Nyamenle die to nu kɛ mɔɔ bɛha ye wɔ Baebolo ne anu la anwo asɔne. “ Yɛsi pi wɔ Nyamenle anu, yɛɛ yɛdie yɛdi kɛ saa yɛdua ye ɛhulolɛ zo yɛbiza ye debie biala a ɔtie yɛ.” (1 Dwɔn 5:14) Ɛbahola wɔaha ɛdawɔ mumua ne wɔ ngyegyelɛ nwo edwɛkɛ ɔ? Ɛhɛe. Baebolo ne ka kɛ: “ Bɛha bɛ ngyianlɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛhile [Nyamenle].” Ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛbahola wɔayɛ nwolɛ asɔne Nyamenle anu diedi. —Luku 17:5. Sunsum nwuanzanwuanza anzɛɛ Nyamenle gyimayɛlɛ tumi ne kɛ ɔboa wɔ ɔmaa ɛyɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la. —Luku 11:13. Anwosesebɛ mɔɔ ɛbava wɔagyinla ngyegyelɛ nee sɔnea nloa. —Felepaema 4:13. Anzodwolɛ anzɛɛ ahonle mɔɔ tɔ azule nu. — Felepaema 4:6, 7. Nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ ɛbava wɔazi kpɔkɛ kpalɛ. — Gyemise 1:5. Wɔ alehyenlɛ biala ngyianlɛdeɛ. —Mateyu 6:11. Ɛtanefakyɛ. —Mateyu 6:12. Sukoa Dɔɔnwo ƐZINZALƐ ARANE Ɛbalie Nyamenle Wɔali Ɔ? Nea kɛzi ɛnwu Nyamenle kɛ Agɔnwolɛ mɔɔ ɛdie ye ɛdi a ɛ kunlu badwo la.

Bɛlɛ Mraalɛ Mɔɔ Ka Edwɛkpa Ne Ɔ? Ɛhɛe. Gyihova Alasevolɛ kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ mraalɛ mgbe dɔɔnwo boka nwo la ka edwɛkpa ne. Kɛmɔ Baebolo ne hanle la, “mraalɛ dɔɔnwo kpalɛ ka edwɛkpa ne.” Gyihova Alasevolɛ mraalɛ di neazo mɔɔ mraalɛ mɔɔ wɔ Baebolo ne anu yɛle la anzi. (Mrɛlɛbulɛ 31:10-31) Ɔwɔ nuhua kɛ bɛnli asafo ne anyunlu kɛ adekilevolɛma ɛdeɛ, noko bɛfa bɛ nwo bɛwula edwɛkɛhanlɛ gyima ne anu. Eza bɛfa Baebolo ngyinlazo bɛkilehile bɛ mra. (Mrɛlɛbulɛ 1:8) Alasevolɛ mraalɛ dua bɛ edwɛkɛ nee bɛ nyɛleɛ zo yɛ neazo kpalɛ maa awie mɔ.

.:MARY O. Mede meho bɔɔ Mormonsom efisɛ na wɔwɔ mmuae ma nsɛmmisa biara a mebisae wɔn no. Na wɔn mmuae yɛ nea ɛtɔ asom na ɛyɛ biribi a mɛtumi de ma abrabɔ agyina so. Ɔsom no wɔ nhyehyɛe a edi mū a ɛne me nipasu hyia ankasa. Mene me kunu pɛɛ sɛ yɛtena asɔredan no mu. Ɛbɛyɛ mfe 13 ne 15 a yɛde somee sɛ Mormonfo no, mede m’asɔredan anisoadehu no kɔɔ baabiara. Wɔ ɛda bi, me somee sɛ “Stake Young Women President” nanso bere a megyae aware no Asɔre no tuu me. Na afei Onyankopɔn huu me na m’abɛyɛ Onyankopɔn ba. Kenkan Mary Osuahu sɛnea ofii Mormonsom mu.

Part 13 What Must We Do to Please God? Twẽ wɔnwo fi bɔne nwo. 1 Korintofoɛ 6:9, 10 Sɛ yɛdɔ Yehowa a, yɛngɔyɛ bɔ okyi ɔ. Yehowa mbena kyɛ yewia, yɛbo nzãa anaakyɛ yɛno nnubɔne. Nyameɛpiri kyi nwonzɛen bɔ betu begua, mmrasua bɔ bɛne mmrasua da, anaa mmienzua bɔ bɛne mmienzua da, ne awuelilɛ. Onguro kyɛ yɛnye kɔboro ebie nikye anaakyɛ yɛkɔhõ. Ɔnzɛ kyɛ yɛsõ bosoen anaakyɛ yedi ahohonzɛm. Abɔnefoɛ biala ngɔtena Paradise bɔ ɔba nanu bie. Yɛ nikyee paa. Mateo 7:12 Sɛ yɛpena kyɛ yɛsɔ Nyameɛpiri nye a, odi kyɛ yesuasua ye. Da ayemye ali kyire mmenia fa kyire kyɛ ɛdɔ bɛ. Di naholɛ wɔ nikyee biala nu. Nwu mmenia anwumvoin na fa bɔne kyɛ. Kã Yehowa nwo dwirɛ kyire mmenia, na maa benwu y’atẽe.

Moyɛ Asɛmpatrɛw Adwuma Anaa? Aane. Baabiara a Yehowa Adansefo te no, yɛbɔ yɛn ho mmɔden yɛ adwuma te sɛ asɛmpatrɛwfo, na daa yɛka yɛn gyidi ho asɛm kyerɛ nnipa a yehyia wɔn. Bio nso, Adansefo bi wɔ hɔ a, wotumi kɔ wɔn man mu baabi a ɛhɔfo nnya ntee asɛmpa a ɛwɔ Bible mu no kɔka bi kyerɛ wɔn, na ebinom mpo tumi tu kɔtena saa mmeae no. Adansefo no bi nso tumi tu kɔ ɔman foforo so kɔyɛ asɛnka adwuma no pii wɔ hɔ. Wɔn ani gye ho sɛ wɔreboa ama Yesu nkɔmhyɛ yi aba mu: “Mobɛyɛ m’adansefo . . . akɔ asase ano nohoa.” Afe 1943 mu no, yɛtew sukuu bi a yɛde tete asɛmpatrɛwfo ma wɔn ho kokwaw. Sukuu no din de Ɔwɛn Aban Gilead Bible Sukuu, na efi bere a yɛtew saa sukuu no, Adansefo bɛboro 8,000 na wɔakɔ bi.

Na mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ ɔnii ama bataatɔ. 2Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bítédu ɔma udeedi ɔni bɛdubɔda bɔlɛ kemo ni, bɛdubɔnu ka bakya ebuo ala utine ubi ɔdi kabuli bényene mmɔ ɔni na ukyuli ɔdi útelie-nwu kama kudii. Kumasi Kumasi: (Kumase) ye Ghana kuro kesee a eso sene Ghana nkuro nyinaa gyese Nkran (Accra). Nnipa a ewo Kumasi beye Opepepem baako (1,000,000) Kumasi abako sem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a Odi Kan bere so. Abakosem kyerese, enam Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a wofre no Komfo Anokye so na emaa Kumasiman yee kese. Wokyere se Komfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yefre no Kumasi yi ene baabi a ene wofre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ekaa Kumasi dua no. Eno na eboa maa 
..........
odi kan, Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture. Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede University of Education, Kumasi Campus, ene mmiensa bi a ennye aban dea te se KNUST. Bɛdie Gyisɛse Bɛdi Ɔ? Ɛhɛe. Yɛdie Gyisɛse mɔɔ hanle edwɛkɛ ɛhye la yɛdi: “ Mame a mele adenle ne, nɔhalɛ ne, nee ngoane ne a; awie biala ɛnrɛhola Selɛ ne ɛkɛ ne kɔ kyesɛ ɔdua me nwo zo.” (Dwɔn 14:6) Yɛdie yɛdi kɛ Gyisɛse vi anwuma a rale azɛlɛ ye azo a na ɔvale ye ngoane mɔɔ ɔdi munli la ɔyɛle ɛkpɔnedeɛ. (Mateyu 20:28) Ye ewule nee ye ewudwazo ne maa menli mɔɔ die ye di la kola nyia dahuu ngoane. (Dwɔn 3:16) Eza yɛdie yɛdi kɛ kɛkala Gyisɛse a le Nyamenle anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne mɔɔ ɔnrɛhyɛ ɔbava anzondwolɛ yeara azɛlɛ ye azo la Belemgbunli a. (Yekile 11:15) Noko akee, yɛnzu edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle la anwo kpolera: “ Selɛ ne . . . ɔle kpole ɔtɛla me.” (Dwɔn 14:28) Yemɔti yɛnzonle Gyisɛse, ɔluakɛ yɛnlie yɛnli kɛ ɔdaye a ɔle Nyamenle Tumivolɛ Bedevinli ne a.

Fa Bible Nnyinasosɛm Yɛ Adwuma Onyankopɔn Asɛm boa yɛn ma yetumi hu nnyinasosɛm a yɛde bɔ bra. Hwɛ adanse ahorow a ɛma yehu mfaso a ɛwɔ Bible nnyinasosɛm so. Hwehwɛ Nnamfo Wɔ Mmeae a Wonhwɛ Kwan Sɛ wofa adamfo a wonyɛɛ bɔne. Nanso sɛ wopɛ sɛ wofa obi adamfo a, Bible mu nnyinasosɛm bɛn na ebetumi aboa wo ma woapaw nnamfo pa? Tie Afotu Na Woahu Nyansa Fa w’adwene si afotu no so, na ɛnyɛ ofotufo no. Afotu a asafo mu mpanyimfo de ma no yɛ adanse a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Yehowa dɔ yɛn. Nnapɔnna Ne Afahyɛ Ahorow a Ɛnsɔ Onyankopɔn Ani Aiden bɛkyerɛw awodadi krataa no so anaa? Aiden papa boaa no ma obehuu nea enti a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛma yɛn som ho tew.

pone bammɔ bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ báwɔlɔ ni, béti nwuna adala na béle-nya akpa ene. Na ɔdi biala úti lɛkpa linwi. Na Yesu awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ ni, bétele-nwu. Aso Hom Gye Eduyɛ To Mu? Nyew, Jehovah Adasefo gye edur nye eduyɛ to mu. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ yɛbɔ mbɔdzen dɛ yɛbɔhwɛ hɛn nyimpadua nye hɛn apɔwmudzen do yie dze, naaso ɔtɔfabi a yehia “oduyɛfo.” (Luke 5:31) Nokwasɛm nye dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ nna Christiannyi Luke a ɔtsenaa ase wɔ asomafo no ber do yɛ oduyɛfo no, dɛmara na ndɛ so Jehovah Adasefo no mu binom yɛ eduyɛfo. Naaso eduyɛ ahorow no mu bi nnye Bible mu ngyindosɛm ahorow nnhyia, na yɛpow iyinom. Dɛ nhwɛdo no, yɛmmpen bɔgya a wɔtwẽ ma afofor do, osiandɛ Bible no kasa tsia bɔgya a obi gye kɔ no mu no. (Ndwuma 15:20) Dɛmara so na Bible no kasa tsia eduyɛ anaa ayarsa a abayisɛm wɔ mu. Naaso, eduyɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ no mu pii nntsia Bible mu ngyinadosɛm no. Ntsi, obiara si nankasa ne gyinae wɔ iyi ho. Jehovah Dasefo bi botum esi gyinae dɛ ɔbɛgye edur anaa eduyɛ pɔtsẽe bi ato mu, naaso Ɔdasefo fofor so bɔpow dɛm ayarsa kor no ara.

Kofi Annan Wɔwoo Kofi Annan wɔ Kumasi a ɛwɔ Ghana. N'awofo de Victoria ne Reginald Henry Annan. Wɔwoo no ataa na ne nuabea Efua Atta wuu 1991. Ne din Kofi kyerɛ sɛ wɔwoo no Fida. Adehyefie na wɔwoo Kofi Annan esan sɛ na ne wɔfa ne ne nanammarima mmienu no nyinaa yɛ ahenfo. N'agya Owura Henry Annan, a ɔyɛ Asanteni ne Fanteni ba, waree Victoria a ɔyɛ Fanteni. Ɔyɛɛ n'edwuma wɔ Lever Brothers Cocoa Comapany a na ɔyɛ Export Manager. Kofi Annan wɔ mma abien a ɔne Nigeriani Titi Alakija woe ansa wɔntam
..........
yi reyɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ wɔbɛkɔ ako nno, Kofi Annan dii kan ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ mma wɔn nkɔ ako wɔ bere a UN mpenee so. Wɔantie no enti eyi de mansotwe kakraa hyɛɛ Amɛrika ne UN ntam bere a na Kofi Annan rehwɛ kuw no so. Wɔ Sudan nso a ɛko resi nno, Kofi Annan kɔɔ so hwehwɛɛ akwan a wɔbɛfa so de UN asogyafo akɔ ɔman no mu sɛnea basabasayɛ no so betwa. Ɔsan nso ne nkramokuw ne aman pii bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ ɛfa sɛnea wɔde faahodie bɛma mmaa ama wɔnn nso etumi abɔ bra a ɛbɛma wɔakoma atɔ wɔn yɛm sɛnea mmarima nya no

Bɛyɛ Edwɛkpatɛlɛvolɛ Gyima Ɔ? Ɛhɛe. Ɛleka biala mɔɔ Gyihova Alasevolɛ de la, bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛda edwɛkpatɛlɛvolɛ subane ali, yemɔti bɛka bɛ diedi ne anwo edwɛkɛ bɛkile menli mɔɔ bɛkɛyia bɛ la. Bieko, Alasevolɛ bie mɔ kɔ bɛ maanle ne ɛleka gyɛne mɔɔ menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne ɛtɛtele Baebolo ne anu edwɛkpa ne la. Bie mɔ noko fi bɛ maanle nu na bɛkɔ maanle gyɛne zo bɛkɔka edwɛkpa ne. Bɛ nye die kɛ bɛlɛboa bɛamaa Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔɔ ɔhanle la ara nu kɛ: “[Bɛbali] me nwo daselɛ . . . bɛahɔdwu aleɛabo ɛleka biala.” Yɛdele sukulu bie mɔɔ yɛfa yɛtete yɛ edwɛkpatɛlɛvolɛma ne la wɔ ɛvolɛ 1943. Ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane toonwo mɔɔ ba la yɛtete Alasevolɛ mɔɔ bo 8,000 wɔ sukulu ɛhye mɔɔ yɛfɛlɛ ye Ɛzinzalɛ Arane Geleade Baebolo Sukulu la anu.

Koo Nimo Agya Koo Nimo yɛ abakɔnnwom mu nimdeɛni titiriw a ofi Ghana. Ɔsan nso bɔ nnwom a ɛde abibimaneɛ ne amanɔne nneyɛe ɛfra. Koo Nimo (a wɔsan frɛ no Daniel Amponsah, wɔ mmere a ɔwɔ Britain man mu no) yɛ ɔdehye esan sɛ ne nuabea waree ɔhene. Ahenfie na osuaa sɛnea wɔbɔ kete nnonnoo. ƐZINZALƐ ARANE JULY 2014 Kɛmɔti A Esiane To Kpalɛma Ɛ? Nyamenle di nwolɛ ɛzonle ɔ? Ɔvi Karma ɔ? Yɛbahola yɛavi amaneɛnwunlɛ nee ɛtane nu ɔ? Esiane Ɛbu Zo! Saa tumivolɛ Nyamenle wɔ ɛkɛ a, kɛmɔti a ɔmbɔ kpalɛma anwo bane ɔnvi esiane nwo ɛ? Esiane To Kpalɛma—Kɛmɔti Ɛ? Baebolo ne kile ninyɛne nsa mɔɔ fa alesama amaneɛnwunlɛ ba la. Mɔɔ Nyamenle Bayɛ Wɔ Esiane Nwo La Asoo ɛ nye die nwo kɛ ɛbadɛnla ewiade mɔɔ esiane ɛnrɛdo kpalɛma wɔ nu la anwo? Ɛnee Mengɔ Mengyakyi Me Etu Annunziato Lugarà bokale basabasayɛlɛ eku bie anwo, noko Belemgbunlililɛ Asalo mɔɔ ɔhɔle la hakyile ye subane. Kɛzi Ɔwɔ Kɛ Ɛtea Ɛ Mra Ɛ? Baebolo ne kile ninyɛne nsa mɔɔ maa ndeanlɛ yɛ kpalɛ la. Asoo Ɛze? Kɛzi menli mɔɔ yɛ meli wɔ tete ne la ɛmmaa nzule ɛngɔ nu ɛ? Kɛzi ɛnee bɛrɛlɛ fɛlɛ wɔ tete ne ɛ? Ɛkola Ɛnwu Nyamenle Ne Mɔɔ Bɛnnwu Ye La Ɔ? Sukoa kɛzi ɛbava wɔ ‘adwenle ne anye’ wɔali gyima la. Baebolo Kpuyia Mɔɔ Bɛbua Asɔneyɛlɛ le adenle mɔɔ bɛdua zo bɛbiza moalɛ ala ɔ?
